channel.title: PI 317 ::onpc command
channel.description: I need help making a ::onpc standing for "other npc"... Or in other words I want another player to turn into that npc code i select... instead of ::pnpc "player npc" ::onpc "other npc" How would I go about doing that?

item.title: PI 317 ::onpc command
item.dc:creator: @Trade_Me Trade Me
item.description:
@Trade_Me wrote:

I need help making a ::onpc standing for “other npc”…
Or in other words I want another player to turn into that npc code i select…
instead of ::pnpc “player npc” ::onpc “other npc”
How would I go about doing that?
